page.title: 07Entertainment around Kilby
page.content: Because the grid is primarily agricultural land and since the area is close to the Urban Centres of Wigston,Oadby and Leicester entertainment within the block is very limited. Apart from the usual annual events in Kilby there is little in the way of organised entertainment. There is only one Public House in the block,"The Dog And Gun" in Kilby itself.There is,however,ample opportunity for outdoor recreation on the neumerous Public Footpaths or Bridle Ways within the block. There is also the open space at Wistow Park and fishing in either the River Sence or Grand Union Canal.In general the lack of organised entertainment in the block is no handicap for there is a vast range available in the nearby Urban Centres..
